title: Screen went blank and presume shutdown and know wont switch back on, reboot nothing? was fully charg
content: Solve a big issue as phone now useless and out of warranty by 3 weeks, was on my phone then left it for 5 mins and came back to it and was blank, wont respond to anything. Has anyone else had this issue or can help fix it, luckily I have an old iphone but I hate it thats why I went to Google!!!!!
